author: ashishjain
msg: GERONIMO-5197 Add Geronimo own HTTP authenticator. Added a RequestCallbackHandler. Add header authentication mechanism
for SiteminderHeaderHandler. As of now only header being utilized is SM_USER. Moving ahead support will be added for other headers.
